scripts.test: cp src/common-styles.js dist/ && cp src/$npm_config_package/* dist/
scripts.prepare-prod: cp src/common-styles.js dist/ && cp src/$npm_config_package/* dist/package && rm dist/package/config.js && mv dist/package/config.js.PROD dist/package/config.js
scripts.clean-up: rm dist/*.js && rm dist/package/*.js && mv main.min.js dist/cards/$npm_config_package.min.js
scripts.build: npm run prepare-prod --package=$npm_config_package  && rollup -c && npm run clean-up
